text: mariyu varito: "Allah avatarimpa jesina dani (sandesam) vaipunaku mariyu pravakta vaipunaku randi." Ani pilicinappudu! Varu: "Ma tandritatalu avalambistu undaga memu cusina (margame) maku calu!" Ani javabistaru. Emi? Vari tandritatalaku emi teliyakunna mariyu varu sanmargam mida lekunna (vari marganne viru anusaristara)
